H0.text: Rainfall increases when trees develop leaves in spring, causing the ten changes that occur on the forest floor.

H1.text: Sunlight is reduced when trees develop leaves in the spring, which causes the 10 changes that occur on the forest floor.

H2.text: Wind speed increases cause the 10 changes on the forest floor that occur when trees develop leaves in spring.

H3.text: Animal migration is stopped when trees develop leaves in the spring, which is one of the 10 changes that occur on the forest floor.
